extendedInfo.description: Dr.Web for Android Light Basic protection from viruses Attention! To protect your mobile device from all types of malware created by criminals, use comprehensive protection â the Light version is not enough.  Features and Advantages â¢	Quick or full file system scanning, as well as custom scanning of files and folders specified by the user.â¢	Real-time file system scanning with SpIDer Guard monitor whenever attempts are made to save files to the deviceâs memory.â¢	Detects new, unknown malware using the unique Origins Tracingâ¢ technology. â¢	Protects the SD card from becoming infected with autorun and Exploit.Cpllnk files, which can be dangerous for devices running Windows.â¢	A quarantine to which detected threats can be moved and from which files can be restored.â¢	Minimal impact on OS performance. â¢	Careful use of battery resources. â¢	Small-sized virus database updates to save traffic, which is especially important for users with limited mobile phone plans.â¢	Statistics on detected threats and actions performed.â¢	Handy and informative desktop widgets to access the application.This version doesn't include important components: anti-spam, anti-theft, and Cloud Checker. To protect your mobile device from all types of malware, use Dr.Web for Android (comprehensive protection).

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This is the best security system ive had I love it I just wish it were free cause its amazing but I can afford it still great app

reviews.comment: Awesome app ..super fast and easy very user friendly

reviews.title: This is the greatest app!

reviews.title: Could not detect virus...
reviews.comment: Enable to remove virus Please.  Also better to have option to enable widget transparency.
reviews.author: Michelle Young

reviews.title: Had 5 stars until update
reviews.comment: There should be a option to allow force stopping the app. You could put a password on that option or something for security. I hate having to try to stop the active parts of the app at same time trying to force stop it to finally get it to stop. In the old version it was nice to run it only when installing new apps then force stopping it to keep phone speed up. Going to uninstall new version and return to old. Long as the updates work you get to keep 4 stars :)

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Latest update is very high battery consuming. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Lakhan Bhandare

reviews.title: Here\'s the deal....
reviews.comment: Works great but....... I had this app for a long time now and is great BUT I NOTICED that my tablet had something wrong in it  and I knew that the problem was bugs because of the way my tablet was acting.... unresponsive apps, things stop all the time ex: unfortunately system UI has stopped and other types of IMPORTANT proceses, and it resets on its own!!!!! this is all because of bugs!!! I run lots of scans with dr. web and it never catches 1 single bug!!!! DR.WEB PLEASE DO SOMETHING TO START CATCHING BUGS!!!!!!!! If this is fixed I will give 5 stars!!!!  **UPDATE** Now this app is WAY better... but, unfortunately, the virus scanner still doesn\'t catch bugs... You gave the app major improvments and for that I gave the app 4 stars instead of 3 stars.
reviews.author: Louise Caruana Galea

reviews.title: Worst update
reviews.comment: After last two updates it crashes nearly every time I try to update virus definitions or take too much time to update than before. Feeling very disappointed.
reviews.author: Sindhuja Yadav

reviews.title: Great security so far
reviews.comment: Best I\'ve used

I run lots of scans with dr. web and it never catches 1 single bug!!!! DR.WEB PLEASE DO SOMETHING TO START CATCHING BUGS!!!!!!!! You gave the app major improvments and for that I gave the app 4 stars instead of 3 stars. I have a BC1003 running Android 4.0.4
reviews.author: Enrique Anthony Galea

reviews.title: Does job well but even for lite version its a big battery drainer
reviews.comment: I\'ve got HTC one x ,and tryed all major antivirus programs, avast I\'ve used for years on pc and love the fact they have android but as this one my god does your battery go down quick,and Dr web great program but these days cany afford to loose this much battery life, I\'ve gone onto mt antivirus and so far so good ,its states 0.1% it uses and it has,so upto you weather you want fancy antivirus with all bells and whistles or just a good program that does the job and does not drain the battery life.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Better then 5 stars!
reviews.comment: I have a S2 and use Dr web just basic for about 8 months  and I am extremely pleased it catches Alot ,great explanations were and from and how to solve the problem all auto maticly with your ok!GREAT JOB GUYS!! Going to buy the advanced!
